#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--)
	{
		int N, K;
		cin>>N>>K;
		int arr[N];
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
		{
			cin>>arr[i];
		}
		int ans = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
		{
			if (arr[i] >= K)
			{
				++ans;
			}
			else break;
		}
		cout<<ans<<'\n';
	}
}
